body.name: Travel First Aid Kit for Kids - Mini First Aid Kit for Car, Purse, Backpack, or Diaper Bag - 75 Piece Travel Medicine Kit Includes All Essential Medical Supplies - TSA-Approved (Kid Joy)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 15 mins
features: For Families, By Families -- Designed by a Mom and a Nurse, the PreparaKit mini first aid kit contains all the essential first aid supplies that young parents need to keep their little ones safe and smiling in the face of inevitable boo-boos.

Perfect Small First Aid Kit For Travel -- At just 5.5” tall and 3.75” wide, our compact, travel-size first aid kit fits in your purse, diaper bag, backpack, or even your pocket. A diaper bag essential if you're traveling with an infant or toddler!

Only The Best -- PreparaKit is latex-free and contains high quality, hospital-grade supplies, including 50 essential first aid items. The easy-open design and pockets help you find items quickly and also offers storage for emergency medication.

Safety...And Fun -- As parents, we know that "safety first" isn't just about tending to your little one's physical ailments; it's about tending to their emotions too! That's why our PreparaKit not only include medical suppliers, but fun stickers too!

TSA-Approved -- What good is a travel first aid kit that isn't TSA approved? That's why we designed our PreparaKit with travel in mind. Not only does it fit easily into a suitcase, carry-on, or purse, but everything in the kit meets TSA requirements.
HSA- and FSA-Eligible -- Looking to spend HSA or FSA dollars? Our PreparaKit kids first aid kit qualifies as an eligible medical expense!

The Mom2Mom Guarantee -- When you take PreparaKit home today, one of two great things will happen. You’ll find it useful to have it around and use it often (hopefully not too often!). Or, it won’t be right for you and we’ll refund every cent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stinking Adorable and Great Quality
reviews.reviewText: My son recently turned two and I finally realized I needed to start keeping a spare bag in the car for potty accidents and his numerous scrapes. I found this little kit and it's adorable: everything from bandaids to medical tape, a safety pin, nail clippers and stickers. The only thing I added was some baby clippers (the ones in here are full size) and character bandaids instead of generic (because we all know Baby Shark bandaids are magic compared to generic, right?). I was also pleasantly surprised to see the quality: instead of the typically plastic tweezers and whatnot these are actually metal ones.That said, it probably won't make it through TSA but it's perfect for the Mama on the go and the perfect size for a purse or diaper bag!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and well designed
reviews.reviewText: You don’t want to skimp out when it comes to your kid, esp when it comes to their health and well being. This kit came with all the essentials and is the highest rated product in the first aid kit section on Amazon.I couldn’t use my Costco kit, since the band aids are adult sized and kids need smaller sizes.It works as advertised. We used it once. Stays in the diaper bag without needing a ton of space.Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love! Love! Love!
reviews.reviewText: I have 5 kids and this is one of the items that I carry everywhere with me. It’s small enough that it fits anywhere- purse, diaper bag and even under the edge of the carseat. It has everything I have needed for my kids when we have those unexpected boo-boos. (Like, when the trip and skin their knee on the way in or out of the doctor’s office- when you’re already running late.). It even saved my oldest daughter at prom- when she unexpectedly needed safety pins. I thought it was a little pricey, but I’ve had my first one for over a year and bought a back up just in case. It’s definitely durable because after a year of constant use- no rips, tears and the zipper and elastic still work great. Just remember to restock if you use something- because it doesn’t hold a lot- but definitely holds what’s needed for any day out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and well stocked
reviews.reviewText: We have been teaching our kids what to have in a day bag for camping, hiking and outdoor activities. This is one of the items we chose to put in their bags. They love them and move them from the hiking bag to school, & travel bags frequently .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!
reviews.reviewText: Having a toddler means you need to be prepared for everything! This is the perfect first aid kit for the price. The scissors in it are very well made. I did end up buying some pop and shake instant ice packs. Would be nice if they were to include one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great variety but lacking on quantity
reviews.reviewText: Great look and compact design. There is a good variety of medical supplies but only one of everything. We will stick with our own stuff eventually. You are really only buying the case
